about_the_game:
"Mush Dash" is a multiplayer party game with up to seven people racing.

You have to complete it to the target point by avoiding various patterns of obstacles and traps.

Experience the special trap of Mush Dash! (Not easy)





Mush Dash consists of five waves per theme, and three waves are randomly determined at the start of play.



After all three waves are over, the rankings are tallied to determine the final winner.





It's also important to finish the wave first, but the more mushroom coins you collect through a number of challenges, the closer you are to winning the final championship.

jumping over several traps and obstacles
Gather Mushroom Coins to Win Final!

name: Mush Dash

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, 11 64-bit Operating System
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-7700 or Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1070
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10, 11 64-bit Operating System
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700 or Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 2060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Escape race of cute mushrooms to escape the danger of becoming a cooking ingredient! Pass through many forms of obstacles with online friends, identify complex bomb patterns and reach your target point faster than anyone else. Achieve various game goals to win first place!
supported_languages: English, Korean, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Greek, Dutch, Norwegian, Danish, Russian, Romanian, Vietnamese, Bulgarian, Swedish, Spanish - Latin America, Arabic, Ukrainian, Indonesian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Czech, Thai, Turkish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Polish, Finnish, Hungarian
